description: Pueblos Indígenas de México: por una cultura de la información

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: Promote an information culture on ethnic and cultural diversity in Mexico. To achieve these goals the project will produce, disseminate and apply data and indexes on indigenous peoples´. Diagnosis on their life conditions will be developed.
donor_long: COMISION NACIONAL PARA EL DESARROLLO DE
